website_summaries.verdict: A solid floor lamp with a sturdy base and quick assembly that's worth its price.
pros: Users report being very satisfied with this floor lamp
not only is it sturdy, but it is also flexible with it versatile side lamps
We like that it comes packaged well and is easy to assemble
cons: A few users reported that the lamp didn't stay in position after adjusting

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Lamp with Great Choices of Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many floor lamps over the years and I've always been disappointed with their quality. Not only is this one attractive but it has great lighting for reading and the two small lamps can easily be adjusted so it can change the mood in the room. With all three lights on, it's almost better than a ceiling light. Some of the reviews for this lamp mentioned the "cheap looking" plastic lamp shades but I don't find them looking cheap at all. In fact, they look like glass unless you're sitting next to the lamp and are scrutinizing them. It has a modern look but is also a transitional style that works well with my southwest decor.
customer_reviews.author: Country Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, great price, superfast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is GREAT (bombproof!). It took only a few minutes to assemble the lamp. The product description says that the bulbs are not included, but three low-voltage bulbs did indeed come with the order. I was so surprised. I really, really like this lamp. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lamp!
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic! It took five minutes to assemble it. So functional and bright. I like the fact that it has three different switches, and I get to use them as needed. The two small lamps are easily adjustable and perfect for reading. The plastic shades look like glass.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Lamp arrived perfectly, looked nice, good amount of light. But within a month the knob to turn the top light on broke. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Calvo

customer_reviews.title: Decent Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice lamp. What would make it better is if the bottom were a little heavier. Other tall lamps I've had did have a heavier bottom making it more secure. It's a nice lamp though and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: puttputt

customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. One was as expected gives off good light and can be turned to direct the light as needed. However, the second lamp did not come with the 2smaller shades and the company didn't wAnt to send the needed parts of accept a return.
customer_reviews.author: mDKRN

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but only lasted 8 months of daily use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this lamp on January 2nd, 2019. I expected the light covers to be different, I guess. Smoother, and more closely resembling glass, but overall, the lamp feels heavy and stable. Today is August 16, 2019 and four days ago, the switch to the main/top light stopped working, as if the part inside that turns it on and off is stripped. After taking it apart, my husband managed to get the light turned on again. We now have to unscrew the lightbulb to turn it off, and the switch is just for looks. Eight months isn't long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: When received and put into use, I originally loved this floor lamp, but after only THREE months of using ONLY on Saturdays and Sundays in my craft room, the bottom light no longer works. Hubby checked it for me and the problem is in the switch, but it can't be taken apart and/or replaced, so now I only have one arm and the middle light working. The kicker is I have the light plugged into the wall switch, so it's always in the "on" position and the actual switch itself isn't being turned, so we can't figure out how or why the switch itself has gone bad. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MagMar

customer_reviews.title: no free returns
customer_reviews.text: i thought the lamp shade is glass instead of the cheap plastic, and the base is not heavy enough, i tried to return this, but Lamp Plus wanted me to pay for the return shipping charge which the charges is more than the lamp, i am very disappointed with this famous company !
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: Great lighting for the money. The LCD bulbs were more than the lamp but I'm very happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ages

customer_reviews.title: The Best Lamp For A Room That Needs Bright Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed!!! I love this lamp. I don’t have any lighting in my living area except for what come through from the dining room and kitchen (this area is a mostly open floor plan). I’ve been searching for a lamp that would be bright enough but also dim enough for middle of the night feedings for the new baby. The picture is with all other lighting turned off. The bulbs are at the highest wattage. The lamp doesn’t look cheap or feel like it will break at the slightest bump like most lamps. Very easy to put together. Soooo impressed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! Even just the main light gives so much light. I feel like the shade cover below it instead of above really allows for the light to fill the room. I have an average size apt. living room and it's all the light I need. The little lights are great for reading or any other task you need an extra bump.
customer_reviews.author: acv211

customer_reviews.title: Good switches. Lots of light if wanted with all ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid metal construction. Plastic shades are cheap looking but not outright ugly - expected at this price. Good switches. Lots of light if wanted with all 3 on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp for the money. Was easy to put together and I'm mechanically-challenged. Works great, looks great for the money. However the threads of the main post, and the gauge of metal material is a little thin. I have it in a corner of a room protected. I feel that if this lamp fell over, then it would be completely toast. Thankfully, the base seems heavy enough, and we keep it on hardwood floors. Don't know that I'd trust it on carpet or not?
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Basic inexpensive lamp
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic, inexpensive lamp. It comes in several pieces.. the main post is three pieces. I give it 4 stars because it does what is claimed, it looks alright and the value is ok. It didn't merit 5 stars for me though. Pros: - Low Cost - Easy assembly - looks good (for the materials used) - small package/light - it was easy to handle/bring into the apartment Cons: - shades are plastic and very lightweight - lights are all on different switches - main post is multiple pieces - main post is very lightweight material
customer_reviews.author: R. Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Have had it for 2 years now and no issues
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a couple of years now. It is a good-looking lamp, but the white parts of the lamp are plastic and for $50 they could be a bit better. You can only tell when you are up close though. On the bright side, the fact that they are plastic makes it super easy to assemble and very light. So it really depends on what you are looking for. If you move often, this might be a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Elz

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp, Well designed & built
customer_reviews.text: One negative that one might run into as I did. When connecting the first upright segment from the base, the screw element was in the tube crooked and made it a problem when connecting the second upright tube. I put some light oil on the outside of the screw element. Important that it was the outside because I didn't want to have oil on the electrical wire and possibly deteriorate it over time. After some doing, I got the two segments assembled, plus the rest of the lamp. It is a NICE lamp and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Of Arabia.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These lights have a 40w capacity for the smaller lights and 150w capacity for the top light. Bought two of these for my office. Found that for me 40w on the smaller lights and 60w for the top light gave the perfect lighting balance: giving off enough lighting but still keeping it soft and relaxed. The small lights are adjustable so you can really customize your lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a light by my husband's chair that would not take up a lot of room. This was the perfect answer. He has a soft light for when he is using his laptop, a stronger light for when he is reading and an even stronger light to light up the entire room. The floor lamp takes up very little floor space and is very light in case we need to move it to another location. Have not noticed a difference in the electric bill either and he uses his lamp every night.
customer_reviews.author: mrsmlbj

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is perfect. It looks nice and gives out plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to place next to a chair for reading. This lamp is perfect. It looks nice and gives out plenty of light. Honestly, I don't even have a bulb at the top because I forgot to purchase one and not sure I ever will. I can easily read a book with just the bottom lights on. Each individual section has a separate on and off switch, which makes it easy to get just the right amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: Reads Too Much

customer_reviews.title: It works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a standing light that would reflect light up to the ceiling with two side lamps movable for reading in 2 chairs with a table between them, which it does well. I wanted something plain, not distracting. The shades are lightweight plastic and the metal base is weighted. The cord is long enough to plug into an outlet about 7 feet from the base. The lamp is similar to one we have across the room. I am not yet sure how sturdy the plastic lampshades are.
customer_reviews.author: PBS Fan

customer_reviews.title: Bright, nice-looking, plastic: perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We put this floor lamp in our playroom. We needed a bright lamp that was durable and not super ugly or cheap looking. This was perfect. The shades are plastic, but you can't really tell. The flexible arms are great for directing light. It was easy to assemble. My husband didn't even bother to read the instructions (which is a problem sometimes, but not here!) We put an 800 lumens 3000K bulb in the main light and it really lights up the room.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Steady base.
customer_reviews.text: The base is steady. I had a different brand that was very unsteady on the carpet. We had to catch that lamp several times before it fell on the floor.....until the last time....when it crashed against a table and spread glass everywhere. I placed my new lamp in a corner, it is not glass, but it looks nice anyways. Of course, don't expect a 200 dlls lamp for this price. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dahls

customer_reviews.title: Great versatility
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Have the high power light on top, a soft light in one branch with a scarf on it for mood lighting and a light that is for SAD in the other branch. Makes it great for lighting the room or reading, applying make-up. The bendable branches are so great for strange reasons as in my phone gets supper hot and wears the battery down. I use the flexible branch to hold my phone when charging or anytime it feels too hot. Cheap but definitely worth more than I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 and am very satisfied. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Provides a lot of light. My living room needs added light. I've tried several pole lamps etc but they didn't really do justice to the room. I got this lamp yesterday (and WOW) it light up the whole room, the light adds elegance to the room and you can use any of the three lights at the same time or individually. I bought 2 and am very satisfied. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Love this Lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this lamp. Was easy to assemble, & nothing was damaged. I enjoy the freedom to adjust the lighting that it offers the way it's designed. The light bulbs it came with are also great! They are nice and bright and cast a white light (which is what I really wanted, I have SAD- Seasonal Affective Disorder, and require a certain type of lighting to keep my mood up and stable to feel at my best) rather than a dim yellow light. I did not want harsh LED bulbs to achieve my goal of brightening up my living room, so I am extatic that this product offered everything I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: J. McClintick

customer_reviews.title: Easy up
customer_reviews.text: We'll se how well it works over time, but it was easy to put together and has the two arms that I need. Two additional lights seems to be hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice floor lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job lighting my office. I like the way the two lower lamps can be adjusted to direct the lights. I like the heavy base. A little correction I would suggest is making he shades just a little longer to cover the end of the lamps, as they show somewhat beyond the ends of the shades. Very happy and satisfied with purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie R. Peck

customer_reviews.title: what a pain!
customer_reviews.text: Currently battling to get one of the rings off a socket in order to screw in bulb. It is seriously ridiculous! Tried using a wrench and now cracked it! I have written to the company but heard from another reviewer they charge you to ship it back. i purchased the protection program though_thank God!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Plastic shades
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this because it has two side lights. However, while it is sturdy and easy to assemble, the shades are plastic. For the price I paid I was surprised it had plastic shades. I didn’t read fully the description (my fault) but I never dreamed this expensive of a lamp would have plastic shades! I almost packed it up and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: I love this floor lamp so much I ordered two more
customer_reviews.text: I started out with just one of these lamps for my salon. I love this floor lamp so much I ordered two more. They look so nice, and I always get compliments on them. I also like that each light has its own individual switch. Super easy to put together too. The globes are plastic, but look very nice. You wouldn't know they are plastic just by looking at them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: Lamps Plus, my favorite place for lighting!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp creates such a wonderful light and adds to the comfortable atmosphere of my living room. It is exactly what I was thinking of. It is really easy to set up and has a sturdy base to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Anne W.

customer_reviews.title: The lamp was easy to put together and looks wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was easy to put together and looks wonderful . So far no problems. The packaging was a bit flaky and suggest you assemble in a room you can clean because you end up with Styrofoam bits all over the place. But it does keep the lamp in good condition for shipping so no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: The center pole is very sturdy and the base is very solid
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much for the price but I was completely blown away. The center pole is very sturdy and the base is very solid. The plastic lamp shades don't look bad and overall I am really happy with it. This is a great lamp and it looks perfect in my living room that doesn't have any light fixtures built in. I put sunlight light bulbs in it and it lights the room perfectly. Plus I love that it has two adjustable arms so that whether someone is sitting on the sofa or the loveseat they can still have light for reading. It was also really easy to put together. This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit Together
customer_reviews.text: the lower portion threaded perfectly together but the upper portion did not have enough receiving threading which leaves an unfinished gap. I double checked, nothing in the way, cord is taught. Just too much or too little threading on one of the pieces when manufactured. Shame because it is very nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike! Was better than advertised and even came with bulbs. My son put it together for me . Took little time. Looks good. Stable and very reasonable in price.
customer_reviews.author: oldladyblues

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This has 3 lights, most versions of this style only has 2 lights. Much better quality than the crappy Amazon version I bought previously. There's a warning sticker that leaves residue. Use rubbing alcohol to remove the sticker residue.
customer_reviews.author: brian.stackhouse@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: I love these lamps with the shorter branches for desk lighting ...
customer_reviews.text: It came with the bulbs, hallelujah, I though they wouldn't. They're very warm bulbs. I love these lamps with the shorter branches for desk lighting purposes or something. It does its job though I honestly wish the lights could be even brighter.
customer_reviews.author: WeiTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Lights up the Room Well, But Quick to Burn Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: The main stem on the top of the lamp seems to be defective- it burns out most standard bulbs after only two or three weeks of use. I've found that only the long-lasting, almost impossible to burn out florescent bulbs actually have any sort of longevity in this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kane

customer_reviews.title: Nice & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Assembly as easy and took under 30mins (there was lots of plastic wrap to remove, which kept the parts from getting scratched). Max 60w on the two side lights and max 150w on the top light. No dimming or 3-way bulb capabilities, but it functions well for the purpose it was acquired.
customer_reviews.author: danikat

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best lamp I’ve ever purchased by far! I do want to mention it’s not as flexible as I expected, but it’s plenty flexible to work with overall. You just need a little movement to help bend it where u want it to go, and it does it that very well! It’s very sturdy and reliable too!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. Provides soft by bright lighting
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Provides soft by bright lighting. The flexible are easy to use, and the main lamp lights the bedroom very well. The lamp is balanced and very sturdy. Packaged well and easy to use instructions. We would again!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: On/Off Switch
customer_reviews.text: Just after the first day of having the light fixture, I went to turn off the light on the left of the stand and the switch would not turn. Has not worked since. The middle switch works as intended but now the left side switch is not working properly. Would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Chad Miller

customer_reviews.title: good, functional lighting needed for a dark corner in ...
customer_reviews.text: good, functional lighting needed for a dark corner in the living room. Easy to assemble. The shades on the daughter lamps are unusually short, so I had to shop for small bulbs that didn't hang below. I am satisfied with it now that I'm using small bulbs made for ceiling fan lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Decent Light
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive light and easy to assemble. It puts off a great deal of light for the price. I painted mine to match my decor and it was delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for the money. Would have been 100 in the stores. I don’t use the side lights but their there if I ever start to read as a hobby. Went together in minutes with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user for life!

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Sturdy Lamp. Comes with Felt Pads
customer_reviews.text: Tree lamp has a heavy, sturdy base so it doesn't rock. The lamp does not lean or tilt but it also comes with small felt pads to stick under the lamp if it does have a small lean to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Logical

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Once I realized the red bag had the instructions, assembly was a snap. Perhaps an "Open Me First" sticker on the bag of instructions might be helpful? Was surprised to also receive light bulbs; didn't think those were included. About 20 minutes of assembly later, the lamp puts out a lot of light and only a tiny bit of heat due to the energy-saving bulbs. Well done! I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise D

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was easy to put together. It even came with the bulbs which was a great plus!!! Looks great. It is sturdy on the floor but comes with tiny pads to add to the base if it is slightly uneven, which it was not. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: dynamene29

customer_reviews.title: The right light.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sturdy feel of this lamp. It really lights up the room and a person can direct the side lights as needed. We haven't been turning on all 3 lights at once. Just one or two provide enough light for our purposes. I feel like this was a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: jackielu

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality was good and assembly was easy, mine (shipped from Lamps Plus) even came with LED bulbs. FYI, the top was a standard (not 3-way) bulb. The lenses are thin plastic so nice and light but I wouldn't recommend incandescent bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mecha

customer_reviews.title: I really like the discrete style and versatile function of the lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really like the discrete style and versatile function of the lamp. It gives great light, was shipped quickly and was easy to put together. Did I mention the price? Wonderful value. Because the shades are plastic, I will see how well they hold-up to the heat without becoming brittle as the years go by. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Sala

customer_reviews.title: Great living room lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Lamp gives the perfect amount of light. It is sturdy and I like the plastic domes because we have a toddler, so I'd he would happen to tip the lamp, there are no heavy glass domes to break.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It broke after using it only a few times; unfortunately I've got rid of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: myriamhg

customer_reviews.title: Loving it - it gets used every night and really ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving it - it gets used every night and really lights up my room. When I do computer work it is crucial that I see my screen and key board and the lamp make that possible - thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Beth Schirmer

customer_reviews.title: Switch will not turn
customer_reviews.text: 2 lamps delivered yesterday look nice but I am dissatisfied that the top switch on one of them will not work as I cannot turn it. I should have read all the reviews as several discussed this problem and problem with returning. Sorry I bought this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Ungard

customer_reviews.title: Provides a lot of light, wonderful contemporary simple style
customer_reviews.text: Contemporary, simple lines, style. It's not high end, but exactly what we wanted. Takes regular bulbs, and for LEDs, provided a lot of light. Reasonably priced, too. We bought two!
customer_reviews.author: RenaissanceWoman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp, lotsa light
customer_reviews.text: Great for reading and listening to music, especially if you insist on reading the lyrics as a follow along. Very easy to put together. Even Phoebe Buffay and Joe Dirt could put this thing together with their eyes closed. And if you insist on obsessing on the black plastic rings, then maybe you could use them as napkin holders. I love this thing so much since it will light up my life a whole lot better than the last dozen blind dates I went on, combined.
customer_reviews.author: Draxxer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fixture
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's the light fixture or the bulb I bought to go with, but turning this on is like turning on the sun. It makes my very dark bedroom REALLY bright when needed.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it if it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, except that the lower side lamp doesn't work. Tried multiple bulbs and nothing. Packaging doesn't lend itself to easily repack to return. Not sure if I would recommend something that doesn't fully work day 1. Will change review if the issue can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, great cost
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It was a great price and it was better than I expected. I like that you are able to bend the smaller lamps to where you want them. I love that each lamp has it's own on and off switch so you don't have to have all 3 lit at once. I was pleasantly surprised by this. I was expecting it so be cheap because of the cost and it is a really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this light....We had very little light in our living room. After receiving this I put soft light bulbs in and its perfect. The middle light for all around lighting and two side lights for when you need that extra beam. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beaird

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Gives a very dark room plenty of light. I was a little disappointed that the globes were plastic, but maybe that’s not such a bad thing for a family room that will be used by a bunch of kids.
customer_reviews.author: njm180

customer_reviews.title: they have very good lamps, I have ordered from them before and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a floor lamp and I found this one from Lamps Plus, they have very good lamps, I have ordered from them before and this particular floor lamp is very good quality and easy to assembled n it came with 3 energy efficient light bulbs, it look great.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: perfect pole lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these if I could figure out where to put another I would buy it great light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: on and off switch is a little faulty, have ...
customer_reviews.text: on and off switch is a little faulty, have trouble turning it on at times as sometimes when you turn the knob it wont click.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lamp that does lamp stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Big heavy lamp. Nice lamp. The packaging was annoying though. They used the Styrofoam that literally just disintegrates upon touch so be ready to clean up after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Nowerewolf

customer_reviews.title: Bad manufacturing. Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My lamp is crooked! I just started assembling it and I found out that the one of the metal screw pieces is crooked! See the pictures. I can’t even connect these two pieces all the way, and I’ve tried to do it so many times!!! The top portion connects fine but the middle and bottom do no screw on all the way. This is really frustrating because returning this thing is going to be such a hassle!!!! Extremely upset.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: very nice bright lamp
customer_reviews.text: very nice bright lamp.the stem of the lamp is made of metal, a little heavy. the shades are made of plastic that sometimes does not stay on one side, but you can move the shades to correct position.the stem stay still. I did not want shades made of glass. I live in california, earthquake zone. I have a medium size living room with only one light bulb, so with the bingham tree torchiere lamp the room is brighten.
customer_reviews.author: grissly bear

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Lights up entire room. Bottom 2 lamps are adjustable so you can move to a target area. Has so far held up several months.
customer_reviews.author: Sdani

customer_reviews.title: Great Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lamp the would light a bedroom. This works great and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stranak

customer_reviews.title: but so far I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a short while, but so far I am happy with it. As the reviews stated, it was easy to assemble. The only reservation I had in purchasing it was that the shades are plastic (breakable). Nevertheless, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KathyPatty

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartment living room
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs it come with are not white clear lights but they are free and included :). It looks nice in the apartment and lights up the living room just fine. It does however feel warmer when I turn them all on.
customer_reviews.author: Dinora E Cubias

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, completely lights up my whole living room. Lamp is sturdy and looks very nice even though the shades are plastic (I do prefer plastic so they are not easy to break, but it's still great that they look nicer than you'd expect. Many lamps only have two lights, so it's wonderful that this has three for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with lamp, great price. Came quickly. Customer service emailed me just to make sure I got the lamp and was happy which I thought was great. Would buy from again
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasant addition to our lighting and a very reasonable price. Used bright white LED bulbs with no problem and the produce the light.
customer_reviews.author: Ed the Biker

customer_reviews.title: The lamp was as advertised, but I should have ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was as advertised, but I should have realized the plastic lampshades would look too cheap for my living room. Also, assembly took longer than expected. The lamp is okay--just not what I should have bought!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this lamp a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp a lot. The base is a little heavier than lamps I've found for similar prices in the stores. I like that because I have cats, and cats are jerks so they have knocked over my other lamp 4 times. This one I've had for well over a month and they haven't even gotten close to knocking it over. The finish is nice and sturdy looking. I like the lamp a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Lamp works perfect and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got a lamp that was broken and they sent a new one. The lamp is perfect for my D&D group in our basement. It provides great lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Carlston

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say about this...
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in less than an hour. Everything fit snugly, with is unusual for the floor lamps I've purchased. It looks pretty swell, too...
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Greyeyes

customer_reviews.title: Product will be returned
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry, I will be returning this product, one of the lamp shades melted. I only use the 40 watt bulb like they said but it melted it didn't stay and it isn't sturdy. I'm sorry but I don't like to give bad reviews but it's not working for me and I'm going to return it Sincerely, Lisa Caruncho
customer_reviews.author: Lisa caruncho

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for my needs at the piano
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for my needs at the piano! One light for the music on the "desk," one light trained on the keyboard, and the torchiere giving lovely ambient light. I really like this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: marijo7

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic floorlamp
customer_reviews.text: Nice, versatile lamp for the price. Not fancy - as noted, the shades are plastic - but certainly serves the purpose without spending a lot.
customer_reviews.author: porter01

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's room 18 months ago. Still gets daily use. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hooked on Romance

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a nice lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this lamp and how each light has its own switch. The flexibility of the side lights let me highline a painting. Does Not look cheap and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I got what I expected in looks and it works fine. At a great price.
customer_reviews.author: mel mallard

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding products and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding customer service. They went out of their way to help me with a purchase I made for a gift to someone! The lamps were perfect, and the quality excellent. It's rare to find a company that values its customer serice as much as they do.
customer_reviews.author: donna i.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Attractive lamp. Brighter lighting upward for plenty of illumination and nice soft lighting that can be directed wherever you desire with the lower two 40 watt lamps. Nice sturdy base for stability.
customer_reviews.author: dwnm45

customer_reviews.title: Like it, want to get another one.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my sewing room, lots of light. I'm going to order another when I can. Easy to assemble and quite stable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda P

customer_reviews.title: Great tree lap.
customer_reviews.text: It gives all the light you'll ever need in an apartment with no ceiling light.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Man

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: The design may not have the fanciest look but the lamp works very well. It came with bulbs. So bright that I replaced one with a LED bulb with lower wattage.
customer_reviews.author: toracat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The shade doesn't diffuse light at all and the black finish is very glossy, imo it makes it look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Our apartment has no ceiling light. This helps so we don’t stumble around in the dark trying to get to a light.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hollingshead

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Terrific lamp. I feared the worst but it was easy to assemble and much better looking than I would have expected at the price. Most importantly it gives good light!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: especially for short people like me. Also
customer_reviews.text: The switch for the top light is too high & not convenient, especially for short people like me. Also, the shades are a little short for most bulbs, which causes the light bulb to show outside of the shade. I do like that each light can be turned on independently of the others. I also have it placed between a desk and a reading chair, so that I have a light for each purpose. It is situated in my home office/study, and is a good fit for utilitarian furnishings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, so far sturdy, and very functional. Can give out lots of light. Love the 2 reading lamps. I use LED bulbs. Shades not too obviously plastic and seem to be able to handle the heat. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our family room and needed some kind of light. This works great as we can light up a portion of the room or use it as a reading lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking but functional
customer_reviews.text: Lights are flexible and nice to be able to aim them but the whole thing looks cheap fur to the plastic shades.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp fits perfect came with LED lights and lights up whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Eastwood300

customer_reviews.title: 6/10 C-
customer_reviews.text: A bit wobbly, and doesn't work with smart bulbs, or smart plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden Cox

product_meta.title: Bingham Modern Torchiere Floor Lamp 3-Light Tree Black Metal White Shades for Living Room Reading Bedroom Office Uplight - 360 Lighting
feature_bullets: 71 1/2" high overall. Top light is 10" wide x 5" high. Side lights are 6" wide x 4" high. Base is 10" wide.
Uses one 150 watt medium base bulb for the main light and two 40 watt medium base bulbs for side lights (not included).
Individual on-off switches for each light.
3-light torchiere floor lamp from the 360 Lighting brand.
Black finish. Metal construction base and pole. White ABS shades.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars439 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
